long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doodle Jump Original is a popular game that has been adapted as a Chrome Extension, allowing users to play it directly on their web browsers. The game can also be played for free on the website https://doodlejump.net/.

In Doodle Jump Original, players control a character called "The Doodler" who is constantly jumping on platforms to reach higher and higher. The goal is to climb as high as possible without falling or getting hit by obstacles. The platforms are randomly generated, and some may move or disappear, adding to the challenge.

To play Doodle Jump Original as a Chrome Extension or on the website https://doodlejump.net/, simply open the web page in your browser and start the game. Players can control The Doodler's movements by tilting their device or using the arrow keys on their keyboard. The game features vibrant and colorful graphics, creating an engaging visual experience.

Doodle Jump Original is known for its addictive gameplay and endless progression. The objective is to beat your own high score or compete with friends to see who can climb the highest. It offers a fun and challenging gaming experience suitable for players of all ages.

Whether playing the Doodle Jump Original Chrome Extension or accessing it through the website https://doodlejump.net/, players can enjoy this addictive game for free and test their jumping skills to reach new heights.

*Note:We have added 2 games is Doodle Jump, and Doodle Jump ninja, and a site link, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website!
